divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband, daughter, 2 sons and myself were driving down the road (i was front seat passenger) from my daughters softball game. I was looking out the side window and saw something bright shiny silver in the sky, it looked like when the sun shines off of metal. I noticed an airplane flying above it and one to the side (they both had the trail of white behind them) but i did not see any lights or smoke near the silvery object. I told my husband to look in the direction i was looking underneath where the airplane was to see if he could see what i was seeing. He and my daughter both looked and saw it. I then asked him what it could be and he stated he's never seen anything like it. It appeared to remain stationary in the sky (not near the ground) for about 5 minutes then when i blinked my eyes it was gone. I did notice i was seeing what appeared to be spots as if i was staring into a bright light. We were only several miles from Fort Leavenworth Army base and it was a clear day.
Summary: Shiny silver object hovering in one spot, daylight no clouds 2 airplanes nearby.
